channel.title: How Do I Run a 508 Server PLSS READ THIS!
channel.description:
Uhm i wont to run my server but if i won't to open ALL CMD files this came:
The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. The device is not ready. Press any key to continue. . .
So uh can some1 send my a better cmd code to edit to all :p.. i try to use the Client: ©Rubik's Scape 508
or can just send me a nice 508 RUN Code lik they do whit compilers to!!! (i mean something like this @echo off ******* Pause)

item.title: How Do I Run a 508 Server PLSS READ THIS!
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:
@Beasty_x wrote:

[quote=“Th3-Pk3r, post:2, topic:241826”]what jdk u got?[/quote] jdk1.6.0_07[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2008, 11:06:02 am[/size][hr]@echo off
cd …/src
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

this are edit to the bat’s of 508… en i got jdk1.6.0_07!!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Run a 508 Server PLSS READ THIS!
